title: The Forbidden Room
writer: Guy Maddin, Evan Johnson, Robert Kotyk, John Ashbery (additional writer), Kim Morgan (additional writer), Kim Morgan (story editor)
actors: Roy Dupuis, Clara Furey, Louis Negin, Udo Kier
plot: A never-before-seen woodsman mysteriously appears aboard a submarine that's been trapped deep under water for months with an unstable cargo. As the terrified crew make their way through the corridors of the doomed vessel, they find themselves on a voyage into the origins of their darkest fears.
